quote: Love has nothing to do with what you are expecting to get-only with what you are expecting to give-which is everything.
author: Katharine Hepburn

quote: Where there is love there is life.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Whatver our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.
author: Emily Bronte

quote: It is a curious thought, but it is only when you see people looking ridiculous that you realize just how much you love them.
author: Agatha Christie

quote: The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite if ourselves.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: In love there are two things- bodies abd words.
author: Joyce Carol Oates

quote: Love makes your soul crawl out from its hiding place.
author: Zara Neale Hurston

quote: There is always madness in love. But there is also always some reason in madness.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Nobody has ever measured, even poets, how much a heart can hold.
author: Zelda Fitzgerald

quote: Have enough courage to trust love one more time and always one more time.
author: Maya Angelou
